title: I was recently at Laney High School for Orientation. One of the parents was a law enforcement officer (I think sheriff dept.) at had his badge on his hip and a gun holstered on his side. (He was not in uniform)Q:If he is there with his wife and son (personal business) should he have his gun on school property,concealed or not during a class orientation around special education students? I am sure he was not on official time since he was conducting personnel business.
